pullrequest.title: Record proof of concept (do not merge)

content.raw: Does `ign-transport` support multiple messages per topic? I've seen in several places that it enforces a single message type per topic, but I suppose it's doing that on a per-Publisher and per-Subscriber basis. So what you're suggesting is that if two Publishers are publishing to the same topic, they could choose to publish two different types of messages? In that case, I imagine we'll need to tweak the schema to support recording the message type on a per-message basis.
